name: Toy 1
description: Experience the thrill of speed with Toy 1, a sleek and powerful sports car. This toy features realistic design and smooth handling, providing endless hours of fun for car enthusiasts of all ages.

name: Toy 2
description: Get ready for high-octane adventures with Toy 2, a dynamic sports car. With its striking appearance and precision engineering, this toy delivers an exhilarating driving experience that will leave you wanting more.

name: Toy 3
description: Cruise in style with Toy 3, a classic regular car that combines timeless design with modern features. Take it for a spin and enjoy the comfort, reliability, and elegance it offers.

name: Toy 4
description: Experience the joy of driving with Toy 4, a versatile regular car that offers great performance and fuel efficiency. It's perfect for everyday commutes and family outings.

name: Toy 5
description: Enforce the law and maintain order with Toy 5, an exciting police car that comes with lights and sounds. Let your imagination run wild as you play the role of a brave police officer keeping the streets safe.

name: Toy 6
description: Join the police force and embark on thrilling missions with Toy 6, a realistic police car equipped with all the necessary gadgets. Chase down criminals and bring them to justice in this action-packed toy.
